lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : 无
[00:01.000] 作曲 : DryJo
[00:06.131]I hate the way you talk to me
[00:07.885]And the way you cut your hair
[00:09.636]I hate the way you drive my car
[00:11.634]And I hate it when you stare
[00:14.130]I hate your big dumb combat boots
[00:15.886]And the way you read my mind
[00:17.881]I hate you so much
[00:18.634]It makes me sick
[00:19.879]And even makes me rhyme
[00:23.384]I hate the way that you’re always right
[00:26.638]I hate it when you lie
[00:28.877]I hate you when you make me laugh
[00:30.627]Even worse you make me cry
[00:34.134]I hate it when you are not around
[00:35.877]And the fact you didn’t call
[00:38.127]The most I hate the way that I don’t hate you
[00:40.136]Not even close
[00:41.380]Not even a little bit
[00:43.131]Not even at all
[00:48.380]I see your monsters I see your pain
[00:51.000]
[00:53.885]Tell me your problems
[00:56.879]I'll chase them away
[00:59.887]I'll be your lighthouse
[01:02.882]I'll make it okay
[01:05.877]When I see your monsters
[01:08.885]I'll stand there so brave
[01:10.881]And chase them all away
[01:12.878]I see your monsters I see your pain
[01:15.128]
[01:17.883]Tell me your problems
[01:20.631]I'll chase them away
[01:23.885]I'll be your lighthouse
[01:26.879]I'll make it okay
[01:29.886]When I see your monsters
[01:32.882]I'll stand there so brave
[01:34.879]And chase them all away
